author: Tucker Reals
title: Coronavirus updates: Pence vows backing for state stay-at-home orders
description: After Trump tweets support for protesters demanding Democratic governors ease shutdowns, Pence says White House will "certainly" stress the need for people to follow orders.
content:
Democratic governors under political pressure to ease stay-at-home restrictions to curb the spread of COVID-19 on Monday asked the White House to help encourage Americans to adhere to those local guidelines.
The request comes after President Trump this weeke… [+1222 chars]
